app.name: Rootly
app.short_description: View Rootly incidents and attach tickets
app.long_description:
Connect support agents to Rootly with a view of recent and related incidents inside Zendesk.

- Attach tickets to new or existing incidents
- View recent incidents
- Create new incidents

For more information refer to [Rootly's Zendesk integration documentation](https://docs.rootly.com/integrations/zendesk).
app.installation_instructions: Click the Install button above to install the Rootly Zendesk app. Then go to [rootly.com/account/api-keys](https://rootly.com/account/api-keys) and generate an API key to use when configuring the app.
app.title: Rootly

apiKey.label: Rootly API key
apiKey.helpText: Generate a Rootly API key at [rootly.com/account/api-keys](https://rootly.com/account/api-keys)

attached.none: No Rootly incidents attached to this ticket.
